title: wdpb/parasight pipeline - params.fastas schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.fastas

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fasta.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

pathogen.errorMessage: (Optional) Genus of sample pathogen, e.g. Cryptosporidium or Giardia (do not include species here)

species.errorMessage: (Optional) Species of sample pathogen, e.g. 'C. parvum'

subtype.errorMessage: (Optional) Subtype/strain/cluster designation of sample pathogen, e.g. IIaA15G2R1

year.errorMessage: (Optional) Calendar year of sample origin, in the form YYYY

month.errorMessage: (Optional) Calendar month of sample origin, as an integer (e.g. January should be denoted as 1)

host.errorMessage: (Optional) Host species of sample, e.g. human, cattle, etc.

source.errorMessage: (Optional) Source material of sample, e.g. stool, dna, etc.

casetype.errorMessage: (Optional) Case type of sample, e.g. outbreak or sporadic
